text: Is there a chance that Queen Elizabeth understands the verb troll in its 21st - century iteration? Is there such a thing as the Royal Urban Dictionary? QEII might not be able to define troll, but it seems the 92 - year - old monarch may be well - versed in executing it. And her victim might have been one Donald J. Trump. The president, of course, paid Queen Elizabeth a visit last week at Windsor Castle during his controversial visit to London, where hundreds of thousands of Brits took to the streets to protest his presence. Trump, who was accompanied by first lady Melania Trump, didn ’ t exactly endear himself to the queen when he broke protocol and walked ahead of her. Video of the breach of etiquette went viral.
